comments.body: If possible, it might be nice to add some comments on what the specific property is that you are trying to test with each of these choices.

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,60 @@
+-- Copyright (c) 2020 Digital Asset (Switzerland) GmbH and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+-- SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
+
+
+module Conditional where
+
+template Cond with
+    owner: Party
+    content: Int
+  where
+    signatory owner
+
+    choice SuccA: ContractId Cond
